articles.title: China is front and centre of gold’s record-breaking rally | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Gold’s rise to all-time highs above $2,400 an ounce this year has captivated global markets. China, the world’s biggest producer and consumer of the precious metal, is front and center of the extraordinary ascent.

articles.title: India to surpass Japan as 4th-largest economy in 2025, IMF says - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Latest estimate shows weak yen hastening reversal by a year
